text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar The border wall had higher priority. The slow response to the coronavirus is on you. NSC warned you about the virus in early Jan. Chinese officials warn the virus is contagious mid-Jan. Jan. 31, travel restriction from China. Mid-Feb. find CDC test kits are faulty. Zero testing.
